verses.roman:
more nindā kare ye, nā kare namaskāra
e-saba jīvere avaśya kariba uddhāra

synonyms: more—Me; nindā kare—blasphemes; ye—anyone who; nā—does not; kare—offer; namaskāra—obeisances; e-saba—all these; jīvere—living entities; avaśya—certainly; kariba—I shall do; uddhāra—deliverance.
translation: "I must certainly deliver all these fallen souls who blaspheme Me and do not offer Me obeisances.
